main_af_commands.get_release_names_from_helm: helm ls -a -n {namespace}| grep caf | egrep -v assistant | awk '{print $1}'
main_af_commands.af_main_from_helm: helm get all {releaseName} -n {namespace}| grep -w passiveMain -A 1 | tail -n 1
main_af_commands.af_passive_enabled: helm get values -n {namespace} -a {releaseName} -o yaml  | grep -A 1  "passiveMain:" | tail -n 1
main_af_commands.get_pod_names: kubectl get pod -n {namespace}| grep caf | grep -v assistant | awk '{print $1}'
